name: Dr. Emily Carter
education: MD from Johns Hopkins University, Residency at Massachusetts General Hospital
areas_of_expertise: Preventative care, chronic disease management, women's health, pediatrics
patient_philosophy: Dr. Carter believes in building strong patient relationships based on trust and open communication.

name: Dr. Sarah Rodriguez
education: MD from University of California, San Francisco, Residency in Dermatology at NYU Langone Medical Center
areas_of_expertise: Skin cancer detection and treatment, acne, eczema, psoriasis
patient_philosophy: Dr. Rodriguez is dedicated to providing comprehensive and personalized dermatological care.

name: Dr. David Patel
education: MD from Yale School of Medicine, Residency in Psychiatry at Columbia University Medical Center
board_certifications: American Board of Psychiatry and Neurology
patient_philosophy: Dr. Patel takes a compassionate and collaborative approach to mental health care.

name: Dr. Maria Garcia
education: MD from University of Pennsylvania, Fellowship in Oncology at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Medical Oncology
areas_of_expertise: Breast cancer, lung cancer, colorectal cancer
patient_philosophy: Dr. Garcia provides supportive and individualized cancer care.

name: Dr. Jennifer Wilson
education: MD from University of Michigan, Residency in Neurology at Mayo Clinic
board_certifications: American Board of Psychiatry and Neurology
patient_philosophy: Dr. Wilson provides comprehensive and compassionate neurological care.

name: Dr. Robert Brown
education: MD from Cornell University, Fellowship in Gastroenterology at Brigham and Women's Hospital
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Gastroenterology
areas_of_expertise: Inflammatory bowel disease, irritable bowel syndrome, liver disease
patient_philosophy: Dr. Brown focuses on digestive health and overall well-being.

name: Dr. Linda Davis
education: MD from Northwestern University, Fellowship in Pulmonology at University of California, Los Angeles
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Pulmonary Disease
patient_philosophy: Dr. Davis is dedicated to providing individualized care for respiratory conditions.

name: Dr. Charles Smith
education: MD from University of Washington, Residency in Urology at University of California, San Francisco
areas_of_expertise: Prostate cancer, kidney stones, urinary incontinence
patient_philosophy: Dr. Smith provides comprehensive urological care with a focus on patient comfort.

name: Dr. Karen Johnson
education: MD from Stanford University, Fellowship in Endocrinology at University of California, San Diego
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Endocrinology, Diabetes and Metabolism
patient_philosophy: Dr. Johnson empowers patients to manage their endocrine conditions.

name: Dr. Richard Williams
education: MD from University of Chicago, Fellowship in Rheumatology at Johns Hopkins University
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Rheumatology
patient_philosophy: Dr. Williams provides compassionate care for patients with autoimmune diseases.

name: Dr. Susan Jones
education: MD from Columbia University, Fellowship in Allergy and Immunology at Mount Sinai Hospital
board_certifications: American Board of Allergy and Immunology
patient_philosophy: Dr. Jones helps patients manage allergies and immune system disorders.

name: Dr. Joseph Miller
education: MD from University of Pittsburgh, Fellowship in Nephrology at Massachusetts General Hospital
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Nephrology
patient_philosophy: Dr. Miller provides comprehensive care for patients with kidney disorders.

name: Dr. Patricia Moore
education: MD from University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center, Residency in Obstetrics and Gynecology at Brigham and Women's Hospital
board_certifications: American Board of Obstetrics and Gynecology
patient_philosophy: Dr. Moore provides compassionate and individualized care for women throughout their lives.

name: Dr. Paul Anderson
education: MD from University of California, Los Angeles, Residency in Emergency Medicine at Los Angeles County+USC Medical Center

areas_of_expertise: Infant and child development, vaccinations, common childhood illnesses

name: Dr. Anthony Jackson
education: MD from University of Virginia, Fellowship in Geriatrics at Johns Hopkins University
board_certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine, American Board of Geriatric Medicine
areas_of_expertise: Aging, dementia, chronic disease management in older adults

education: MD from Washington University in St. Louis, Residency in Anesthesiology at Barnes-Jewish Hospital
areas_of_expertise: General anesthesia, regional anesthesia, pain management
